label: Antivirus and Security Software
description: Software designed to protect computer systems from malware, viruses, and other security threats.

subcategories.label: Antivirus Software
subcategories.description: Software designed to detect and remove viruses and other malware from computer systems.

subcategories.label: Internet Security Software
subcategories.description: Software designed to protect computer systems from online security threats, such as phishing and hacking attempts.
subtopics: Internet security for specific operating systems

subcategories.label: Mobile Security Software
subcategories.description: Software designed to protect mobile devices from security threats, such as malware and hacking attempts.

subcategories.label: Data Protection and Encryption
subcategories.description: Software designed to protect sensitive data from unauthorized access and theft.

subcategories.label: Network Security
subcategories.description: Software designed to protect computer networks from security threats, such as hacking attempts and malware.
